API reference¶

align: Functions¶

prepare_transcripts(input_files, …[, …]) Prepare transcripts for similarity analysis.
calculate_alignment(input_files, …[, …]) Calculate lexical, syntactic, and conceptual alignment between speakers.
calculate_baseline_alignment(input_files, …) Calculate baselines for lexical, syntactic, and conceptual alignment between speakers.

Available datasets¶

To load available datasets, check out:

CHILDES_directory str(object=’‘) -> string
